Class Server

    • es.deusto.server.server.Server

 @Produces(value="application/json")

extends Object

    • Field Detail

      • appService

        private AppService appService
        This class is the one that receives the requests from the client. There is no functionality implemented in this class, all the possible requests have a corresponding method inside the AppService class in which all the functionality is implemented. That way, the Server class is abstracted from the business objects.

        public Server()

    • Method Detail

      • attemptNormalLogin

        @POST
 @Path(value="/login")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response attemptNormalLogin(LoginAttempt login)
        This method is invoked whenever a POST request is made to the following path: /login . It is used for the login process of regular users.
        Parameters:
        login - Login information of the user (email and password)
        Returns:
        Response object with the information of the user, in case of valid credentials. If not, an empty response is returned

      • attemptOrganizerLogin

        @POST
 @Path(value="/loginOrganizer")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response attemptOrganizerLogin(LoginAttempt login)
        This method is invoked whenever a POST request is made to the following path: /loginOrganizer . It is used for the login process of organizers.
        Parameters:
        login - Login information of the organizer (email and password)
        Returns:
        Response object with the information of the organizer, in case of valid credentials. If not, an empty response is returned

      • attemptNormalSignup

        @POST
 @Path(value="/signup")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response attemptNormalSignup(SignupAttempt signup)
        This method is invoked whenever a POST request is made to the following path: /signup . It is used of the signup method of regular users.
        Parameters:
        signup - Signup information of the user (name, email, password, city and interests)
        Returns:
        Response object with the information of the user, in case of correct user registration. If not, an empty response is returned

      • attemptOrganizerSignup

        @POST
 @Path(value="/signupOrganizer")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response attemptOrganizerSignup(SignupAttempt signup)
        This method is invoked whenever a POST request is made to the following path: /signupOrganizer . It is used of the signup method of organizers.
        Parameters:
        signup - Signup information of the organizer (name, email, password and organization)
        Returns:
        Response object with the information of the organizer, in case of correct registration. If not, an empty response is returned

      • recoverPassword

        @POST
 @Path(value="/passwordRecovery")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response recoverPassword(LoginAttempt userInfo)
        This method is invoked whenever a POST request is made to the following path: /passwordRecovery . It is used for password recovery for users who can't remember their passwords.
        Parameters:
        userInfo - LoginAttempt with the email of the user who needs a new password
        Returns:
        Response object with the following message: "OK"

      • createEvent

        @POST
 @Path(value="/createEvent")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createEvent(EventInfo eventInfo)
        This method is envoked whenever a POST request is made to the following path: /createEvent . It is used for the creation of new events from a given organizer.
        Parameters:
        eventInfo - EventInfo with the data of the event that will be created
        Returns:
        Response an empty response

      • attemptUserDelete

        @POST
 @Path(value="/delete")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response attemptUserDelete(UserInfo userInfo)
        This method is invoked whenever a POST request is made to the following path: /delete . It is used of the delete method of users.
        Parameters:
        userInfo - - UserInfo object containing user's email
        Returns:
        Response string with the user's email, in case of user delete was successful. If not, an empty response is returned
        Since:
        Sprint 2
